articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent messages to foreign party and state leaders in reply to their greetings on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The reply messages went to the president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic who is general secretary of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the president of the Syrian Arab Republic and the president of the State of Palestine who is chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization.
					
					 In the messages Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks for their warm congratulations and best wishes to him on the 72nd anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He wished them success in their work, extending full support and solidarity to the just cause of the peoples of their countries.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets German Guest
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets German Guest
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday had a talk with Wolfgang Nowak, former general director for Political Planning of Mr. Schroeder's Cabinet of Germany, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea-Sponsored "International Film Festival for Human Rights in North" Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korea-Sponsored "International Film Festival for Human Rights in North" Flailed 
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in a statement Friday hit out at the south Korean puppet forces for staging the farce of "international film festival for human rights in the north" in Seoul.
					 Those who flocked to the festival were without exception pseudo-moviepersons from south Korea and the West who act as a shock brigade in denying the reality of the DPRK, at the instigation of the U.S. and with the financial support from it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The puppet forces even let "defectors from the north" take part in the festival, fanning up the atmosphere of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Their "human rights" racket is an outright challenge and a serious politically-motivated provocation to the dignity and the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 This treachery of pushing the confrontation with the fellow countrymen to the extremes under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. is absolutely intolerable.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the rubbish-like films justifying the hideous crimes against humanity such as the illegal abduction of DPRK citizens were openly screened in the center of Seoul at the tacit connivance of the present puppet authorities allegedly speaking for "candlelight demonstrators".
					
					 The confrontation burlesque dubbed "international film festival for human rights in the north" which Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye group of traitors used to hold has been carried forward. This clearly proves that the group of past conservatives and the present ruling authorities are all the same group of traitors and criminals inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The puppet authorities do not hesitate to hold the racket for "human rights" campaign to do harm to the DPRK, at the end of getting zealous in their moves to provoke a nuclear war against the north and to put sanctions on it while following the U.S. as a shaggy dog.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never tolerate the puppet authorities and the organizations hatching plots against the DPRK and kicking up the racket over "human rights" in the north as they slander and hurt the dignity and social system in the DPRK, which represent the lifeline of its army and people.
					
					 The puppet authorities should not run amuck, bearing in mind that their acts of following in the footsteps of the group of conservatives and traitors being pursuant to the U.S. will be rejected by the people and face a bitter final ruin.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Attends Meeting for Consideration of Combined Report on CEDAW Implementation
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Attends Meeting for Consideration of Combined Report on CEDAW Implementation
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting for the consideration of the Second and Fourth combined report on the implementation of the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women (CEDAW) at the ongoing 68th Session of the Committee on Elimination of Discrimination against Women successfully came to a close on Nov. 8.
					 Attending it was a DPRK delegation headed by the permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva.
					
					 At the meeting the head of the DPRK delegation made, first of all, a keynote speech on the measures taken by the DPRK government to implement the convention and its efforts for doing so and on how the women are enjoying their rights in the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK submitted the Second and Fourth combined report on the implementation of the CEDAW, which covers the period of 2002-2015, the head of the delegation said:
					
					 As stated in the report, during the period under consideration, the DPRK government took a number of legal and administrative measures for the development of women and the protection and promotion of their rights in all fields of state activities and social life, thereby achieving considerable successes.
					
					 Several laws including the Law on the Protection and Promotion of the Rights of Women and the Law on Labor Protection were adopted and amended and women are exercising equal rights with men in state activities and all fabrics of social life. Preferential treatment is made by the State for women such as maternity leave, exemption of women from arduous and harmful work, prohibition of their night shift and overtime work.
					
					 Thanks to the policy of attaching importance to, respecting and loving the people enforced by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the national measures and social efforts for the protection and promotion of the women's rights are further enhanced in the DPRK today.
					
					 Noting that the efforts to fully implement the CEDAW are being seriously affected by the harsh economic blockade and sanctions of the hostile forces against the DPRK, he went on to say:
					
					 The unethical sanctions running counter to humanitarian ideal and human rights are unjustifiable and should be lifted unconditionally and immediately. 
					
					 We categorically reject the extremely politicized human rights dialogue based on false testimonies of "defectors" on the international arena, but we are willing to engage in dialogue and cooperation for protection and promotion of genuine human rights.
					
					 As a state party to the CEDAW, we will, in the future, too make active efforts to fulfill its obligations to the international community.
					
					 At the meeting, members of the CEDAW appreciated the measures taken for the protection and promotion of the rights of women in the DPRK during the period under consideration and successes made in that course and raised a number of questions which were fully answered by the DPRK delegation.
					
					 The DPRK delegation's participation in the 68th meeting of the UN Committee for the Elimination of Discrimination against Women marked an important occasion in promoting international understanding and cognition of how the women are enjoying the genuine rights in the DPRK and showing the DPRK's will to cooperate on the UN human rights arena.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, came back home Friday after taking part in the 19th International Meeting of Communist and Workers' Parties and the celebrations of the 100th anniversary of the October Socialist Revolution held in Russia.

articles.title: Ugandan President Supports Korea's Peaceful Reunification
articles.content:
Ugandan President Supports Korea's Peaceful Reunification
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador to Uganda Jong Tong Hak presented his credentials to Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on Nov. 7.
					 The president said that he visited Pyongyang several times in the past and he was still remembering his meeting with President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Uganda invariably supports Korea's peaceful reunification and sticks to the stand of opposing a war.
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification should be discussed and solved by the Koreans in the north and the south themselves and the outsiders' interference be terminated.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Post and Telecommunications Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Post and Telecommunications Held
Phyongsong, November 10 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of post and tele-communications took place in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK from November 7 to 10 under the co-sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea and the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications.
					 Attending it were officials, teachers, researchers, three-revolution team members of different units including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Huichon University of Technology, the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications and units under provincial telecommunication management bureaus.
					
					 Presented were at least 300 valuable papers which were completed in the drive to put post and telecommunications on a Juche, modern, scientific and IT basis.

articles.title: Color Illumination LED System for Plant Growth Developed
articles.content:
Color Illumination LED System for Plant Growth Developed
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Electronic Goods in the DPRK recently developed a color illumination LED system good for the plant growth.
					 This system uses color LED as a source of light. It gives out the light of wavelength band effective for plant growth even in the winter season, thus shortening the growing period.
					
					 Ri Myong Chol, section chief of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The color illumination LED system has already been introduced into greenhouses of the Central Botanical Garden and the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, proving effective.
					
					 The sapling grown in the method of tissue culture under this system is more superior in quality to the sapling brought up in the method of tissue culture under the fluorescent lamp light and is 2.4 percent higher in differentiation percentage.
					
					 The color LED lamps give no harmful effect to the leaf.
					
					 This system is being introduced at greenhouses across the country, including those of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.

articles.title: Fumigation Therapy Registered as National Intangible Heritages
articles.content:
Fumigation Therapy Registered as National Intangible Heritages
Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Recently, fumigation therapy was registered as national intangible heritages in the DPRK.
					 It is one of the traditional Koryo therapies. It is a remedy using vapor and smoke arising from boiling and burning of Koryo medicines, and decoction.
					
					 It was recorded in "Tonguibogam", "Uibangryuchwi", "Hyangyakjipsongbang" and other old books on Koryo medicine.
					
					 It is considered to be derived from a treatment by sauna.
					
					 It gives no adverse effect and pain on the human body.
					
					 It is a good curing method which organically combined the pharmacological effects of thermotherapy with transpiration and smoke of medicine.
					
					 In recent years, the Institute of Koryo Medicine and other preventive and curative medical care institutions have introduced the fumigation therapy to raise the rate of curing patients completely.

articles.title: S. Korea's "Diplomacy with Four Neighboring Powers" under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's "Diplomacy with Four Neighboring Powers" under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Friday carry an article denouncing the south Korean authorities' policy of dependence on outsiders.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Now the south Korean authorities call for "diplomacy with four neighboring powers" to boost "cooperation in settling the north's nuclear issue" and "alliance" and push ahead with renegotiation for FTA and solution of the issue on sharing the expenses for the upkeep of the GIs forces with the U.S. and settle friction over the issue of history and direct efforts to developing the forward-looking ties with Japan.
					
					 It goes without saying that all this is treacherous crimes of deepening the outsiders' domination and subordination of south Korea and strengthening cooperation with the U.S. and Japan masters in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities claim that they would reduce friction and discord with China over the THAAD deployment and boost cooperation with Russia. But their major goal is to establish the relations of cooperation for "settlement of the nuclear issue of the north".
					
					 As shown above, their call for "diplomacy with four powers" is a revelation of the wicked scheme to realize the sinister ambition for "settlement of the nuclear issue of the north" by increasing the cooperation for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK together with the U.S. and Japan and other neighboring countries as the Park Geun Hye group did and finally hurt the dignified socialist system of the DPRK.
					
					 Such foolish flunkeyist and traitorous "diplomacy" will surely come to failure.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the present south Korean ruling quarters' foreign policy can never be recognized by the international community and its bankruptcy is inevitable as long as they remain colonial servant of the U.S. and do not give up the wild ambition for confrontation with the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: U.S. Should Give up Wild Dream of Stifling DPRK by Force: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Give up Wild Dream of Stifling DPRK by Force: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and other hostile forces are seeking to trigger a nuclear war, conducting ceaseless joint military exercises under the eyes of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 Citing detailed facts to show that the U.S. has more frantically conducted nuclear war drills from the outset of the year despite the DPRK's warnings and public protests, the article goes on:
					
					 The standoff between the DPRK and U.S. has lasted over half a century but the latter's hysterical moves to invade the former have reached the height this year.
					
					 We have clearly showed the will to mercilessly smash the war maniacs with a barrage of concentrated strikes as they are wrecking peace on the Korean peninsula and regional stability and bring the situation to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. is describing the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense as a "threat to the world" just like "the guilty party filing the suit first".
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the only way to protect peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region from the U.S. and its vassal forces' nuclear threat and blackmail is to ensure the equilibrium of force by beefing up the nuclear force both in quality and quantity so as to annihilate the invaders and provocateurs without mercy.
					
					 Peace is guaranteed by equilibrium of force. This is the truth taught by the reality in which highhandedness and tyranny of imperialism are rampant.
					
					 The DPRK has made a great contribution to ensuring peace of this planet, defending peace and security and frustrating the U.S. attempt to ignite a new world war by dint of its powerful war deterrent.
					
					 The U.S. should drop a daydream of stifling the DPRK by force of arms.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Give up Dream of Negotiations for Denuclearization
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Give up Dream of Negotiations for Denuclearization
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the deputy secretary of the U.S. Department of State said the U.S. goal was to pressurize "north Korea" to come out for negotiations without precondition. And the special representative for DPRK policy asserted that "negotiations with the north have to be sincere and trustworthy with no strings attached, if there would be any." Meanwhile, war maniac Trump and those of the U.S. military call for putting in place a "military option" and intensifying closely-cooperated pressure diplomacy along with international "siege and blockade" in a bid to lead "the north to change in its attitude".
					 Their call for "denuclearization negotiations without preconditions" is shameless sophism aimed at persuading the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to kneel down before the burglar, Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is an inevitable result of the U.S. nuclear blackmail and hostile policy. It is neither a temporary countermeasure to cope with the kaleidoscopic situation nor a bargaining chip for any dialogue, but it is the best strategic option to protect the supreme interests of our revolution and security of the nation.
					
					 The U.S. should give up its foolish daydream that the DPRK would meet its brigandish demands, a dream of denuclearization negotiations with the DPRK in particular.
					
					 We do not oppose dialogue but will never put the issue related to the supreme interests of the DPRK and security of its people on the bargaining table. We are not interested in such dialogue and negotiations in the least.

articles.title: Jurists Bodies of World Call for End to U.S. Military Threat in Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Jurists Bodies of World Call for End to U.S. Military Threat in Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The International Association of Democratic Lawyers, the Asia-Pacific Jurists Association and lawyers organizations in the U.S., Japan and south Korea on Nov. 7 adopted a joint statement calling for putting an end to the U.S. military threat and achieving the lasting peace in the Korean peninsula.
					 The statement charged that U.S. President Trump threatened to "totally destroy" the DPRK at the UN General Assembly in September and made a mockery of the resolution of the world people who created the UN in 1945.
					
					 The U.S. has kept tens of thousands of its troops in south Korea, failing to abide by the 1953 Armistice Agreement, it pointed out.
					
					 It has deployed nuclear weapons in south Korea and sold arms worth billions of US dollars each year, and is now encouraging the deployment of THAAD, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The lasting peace accord is crucial to the Korean peninsula. The authorities of the U.S., Japan and south Korea must stop using military bases in south Korea and Japan, which escalates the tensions in the peninsula and poses a threat to the DPRK, and deploying THAAD and strategic bombers, nuclear subs and other strategic assets of the U.S.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. to stop at once the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises for threatening the DPRK through a preemptive attack and deploying U.S. strategic weapons and the military operation scenario based on "decapitation operation" targeting the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 It stressed that the international community should life up the voice of opposition to the U.S. getting hell-bent on military provocations and drills while keeping military bases in the Asia-Pacific region and other parts of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Brazil
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics posted on its website the full text of Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" on Nov. 3. 
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully realizing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Austria
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- An Austrian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Vienna on Nov. 6.
					 Thomas Losh, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and the greatness of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Justice Supported in Uganda, Brazil
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Justice Supported in Uganda, Brazil
 Pyongyang, November 10 (KCNA) -- Ugandan and Brazilian organizations issued statements in support of the Korean people's cause of justice.
					 The Uganda Farm and Agro-Based Workers' Union expressed invariable solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to defend the country's sovereignty and right to existence and the will to steadily develop friendship and cooperation between the agricultural workers of the two countries.
					
					 The National Guidance of the Small Farmers Movement of Brazil said in its statement:
					
					 We scathingly reject U.S. President Trump's violent remarks against the DPRK and the Yankee regime's all sorts of provocations against the countries advancing under the banner of anti-imperialist struggle. We also condemn the misinformation about the DPRK spread by the reptile means speaking for the imperialists' interests every day.
					
					 We know well about how the U.S. sanctions and blockade against the DPRK hurt the Korean people. 
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people and the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea will more vigorously struggle to defend the country's sovereignty.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con personalidad alemana
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con personalidad alemana
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del CC del PTC y presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, converso el dia 10 con Wolfgang Nowak, ex director general de Planificacion Politica del Gabinete del Sr. Schroeder de Alemania, quien se encuentra de visita en Corea.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN denuncia "festival internacional de cine" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN denuncia "festival internacional de cine" en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica el dia 10 una declaracion condenando el "festival internacional de cine de los derechos humanos en el Norte de Corea", que tuvo lugar en Seul.
					Todos los concurrentes a esta "galeria" son los seudo-cineastas del Sur de Corea y del Occidente que bajo la instigacion y el apoyo financiero de EE.UU., juegan importante rol en la tergiversacion de la realidad de la RPDC, subraya el documento y continua:
					
					Ademas de ellos, estuvieron presentes alli los "fugitivos norcoreanos", quienes incitaron la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					El presente escandalo de "DDHH del Norte de Corea" orquestado por los titeres surcoreanos deviene un desafio total a la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC y grave provocacion politica.
					
					No puede ser tolerada esta locura que lleva al extremo la confrontacion fratricida bajo el control trasero de EE.UU.
					
					Lo grave del caso es que las peliculas malsanas que encomian la seduccion y secuestro ilegales contra los habitantes norcoreanos se proyectan en Seul bajo el amparo y la tolerancia de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas, que "representan la opinion de los manifestantes con velas encendidas".
					
					La actual situacion surcoreana en que se continua esa farsa conflictiva realizada durante el mandato de los traidores Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye, muestra patentemente el hecho de que son iguales tipejos antinacionales la banda de traidores conservadores del pasado y las actuales autoridades surcoreanas en poder.
					
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas, insatisfechas por las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC y la sancion anti-RPDC, desarrollan sin vacilacion alguna los alborotos intrigantes de "DDHH", de manera que multiplican sus culpas.
					
					Todos los militares y civiles de la RPDC no perdonaran nunca los crimenes antinacionales de las autoridades surcoreanas y las entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC que recrudecen la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, calumniando e insultando la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que recibiran el fuerte rechazo del criterio popular y sufriran la amarga destruccion final, si repiten la trayectoria de las bandas conservadoras siguiendo ciegamente a EE.UU.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana presenta la situacion de DDHH de mujeres coreanas
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana presenta la situacion de DDHH de mujeres coreanas
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedo concluido exitosamente durante la 68a reunion del Comite de la Eliminacion de la Discriminacion contra Mujeres de la ONU, que transcurre en Ginebra, el debate del informe (del segundo al cuarto) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la ejecucion del convenio para la eliminacion de la discriminacion contra mujeres.
					En la ocasion participo la delegacion de la RPDC, encabezada por el representante permanente ante la Oficina de la ONU y las organizaciones internacionales en Ginebra.
					
					Ante todo, el jefe de la delegacion coreana pronuncio el discurso de base que presenta las medidas tomadas por el gobierno de la RPDC por la ejecucion del convenio arriba mencionado y la situacion de disfrute de DDHH por la poblacion femenina en el pais.
					
					El informe (del segundo al cuarto) de la RPDC, presentado a la ONU, comprende el periodo 2002-2015, comenzo el jefe de la delegacion coreana y continuo:
					
					Durante el periodo de examen, el gobierno de la RPDC tomo muchas medidas legales y administrativas para el desarrollo de las mujeres y la proteccion y fomento de sus derechos en todos los sectores de la vida social y logro no pocos exitos en el curso de su ejecucion.
					
					Se adoptaron y se enmendaron la ley de aseguramiento de derechos femeninos, la ley de proteccion del trabajo y otras mientras las mujeres ejercen dignamente los derechos iguales con los hombres en las actividades del Estado y todos los dominios de la vida social. Y se implementan estrictamente las medidas preferenciales tomadas especialmente por el Estado para las feminas, inclusive el sistema de la licencia de maternidad y la prohibicion de trabajo nocturno y del tiempo extra. 
					
					Gracias a la politica del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un de apreciar, respetar y amar al pueblo, se multiplican hoy dia en la RPDC las medidas estatales y los esfuerzos sociales por proteger y fomentar los derechos de las mujeres.
					
					Los esfuerzos por ejecutar plenamente el convenio en cuestion se enfrentan con grandes obstaculos debido al brutal bloqueo y sancion economicos de las fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC. La sancion antietica, contradictoria al ideal humanitario y a los derechos humanos, no puede ser justificada de ninguna manera y ha de ser levantada inmediata e incondicionalmente.
					
					Rechazamos totalmente la "discusion de DDHH" que se abre en la arena internacional con la movilizacion de los "fugitivos norcoreanos" persiguiendo malsanos objetivos politicos, pero mantenemos la posicion de fomentar activamente el dialogo y la cooperacion para la proteccion y fomento de los verdaderos derechos humanos. 
					
					Como signataria del convenio, la RPDC se esforzara en lo adelante tambien por cumplir sus compromisos asumidos ante la sociedad internacional.
					
					A continuacion, los miembros del Comite de la Eliminacion de la Discriminacion contra Mujeres de la ONU evaluaron las medidas tomadas por la RPDC para proteger y fomentar los derechos femeninos y los exitos logrados en esta materia y formularon algunas preguntas. 
					
					La delegacion coreana les dio respuestas suficientes.
					
					La participacion de la delegacion coreana en la reunion marco un hito importante para facilitar la comprension internacional sobre el estado real de disfrute de derechos de las mujeres en la RPDC y demostrar la voluntad de esta de cooperar en los escenarios de DDHH de la ONU.

articles.title: Yoweri Kaguta Museveni expresa apoya a reunificacion pacifica de Corea
articles.content:
Yoweri Kaguta Museveni expresa apoya a reunificacion pacifica de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jong Tong Hak, presento el dia 7 sus cartas credenciales ante el presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					  El presidente ugandes recordo con gran emocion sus reiteradas visitas a Pyongyang, ocasiones en las cuales se reunio con el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Expreso invariable apoyo a la reunificacion pacifica de Corea y estricta posicion antibelica.
					
					  El problema de la reintegracion territorial de Corea debe ser discutido y solucionado por los coreanos en el Norte y el Sur, dijo e insistio en acabar con la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras.

articles.title: Efectuada presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de la rama de comunicaciones
articles.content:
Efectuada presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de la rama de comunicaciones
Phyongsong, 10 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar desde el dia 7 hasta el 10 en la ciudad de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur la presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de la rama de comunicaciones bajo coauspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea y el Ministerio de Comunicaciones.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios, profesores, investigadores y miembros de los grupos por las tres revoluciones de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, el Instituto Superior de Industria de Huichon, el Ministerio de Comunicaciones, las unidades adscritas a las direcciones provinciales de comunicaciones y los miembros de los grupos para las tres revoluciones.
					
					Y se presentaron mas de 300 tesis estudiados y acabados en el proceso para realizar la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion, la cientifizacion y la informatizacion de comunicaciones.
					
					Durante el curso de la presentacion hubo la leccion de la tendencia cientifica y tecnica, el seminario del sistema de la administracion combinada y la visita a la Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong, la Direccion de Informaciones y Comunicaciones de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y otros lugares.
					
					Atrajeron la atencion los exitos presentados por las direcciones de comunicaciones de las provincias de Phyang-an del Sur, Hamgyong del Norte, Hwanghae del Norte y Kangwon que tienen el alto nivel cientifico y tecnico, la eficiencia economica y el valor de generalizacion.
